short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience vibrant media displays every time you open a fresh new browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unveil a new dimension of browsing with MediaScape New Tab, your gateway to a curated universe of enthralling media visuals. Every time you open a new tab, step into a world where high-resolution animations, videos, and images blend to offer a mesmerizing digital escape. Designed for the discerning user, MediaScape prioritizes quality, presenting visuals that are crisp, vibrant, and sure to inspire.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "MediaScape - New Tab" search setting will be provided by Microsoft Bing and that provided by the service, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

https://tubeextension1.com/new-tab/privacy.html
https://tubeextension1.com/new-tab/terms.html

Beyond just visuals, MediaScape seamlessly integrates with your browser, ensuring a lag-free and fluid experience. Personalize your media journey by setting preferences, or let the vast array of visuals surprise you each time. 

When you use the search feature in the new tab, we only collect your search term. By Adding this extension, you consent to our collection of your search data for transmission to Microsoft Bing.
